expensify.title: Expensify app
expensify.description: React app. Connect with firebase. Contains authentication, sorting, adding, deleting and edition our expenses.

smartBrain.title: Face recognition app
smartBrain.description: React app with Node and PosgreSQL. Connect with Clarifai API responsible for detecting faces on pictures. Supports only first hit if you add picture url where is more faces app still frame only one face.

Burger.title: Burger
Burger.description: React app. Connect with firebase. App allow to build your own burger from 4 ingredients, order it - send to firebase - and see history of your orders. Contains authentication.
